channel.title: Final Revelations Wiki
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Final Revelations Wiki

item.title: Current Story
item.description: Races Amorus Company Khan: (Saiyan) Valerian: (Demon) Felistor: (Tuffle) Sanguine Apostates Oleadriar: (Human) Asperian: (Kai) Lizard-Folk: (Changeling) Enmity (Application ...

item.title: Passives
item.description: A Passive is similar to a Trait, in that it gives passive bonuses to a character. The main difference is that a Passive cannot be leveled up, does not have a rank, and cannot be bought through Trait Points (TP), usually being unlocked through specific means.

item.title: Traits
item.description: Traits are passive modifiers that a character can achieve. They can be leveled up using Trait Points (TP) to increase the Rank of a trait. Most traits have 24 ranks (F- to A+, S- to S+, SS, SSS, God), but certain traits like Transformation traits have a variable number of ranks.

item.title: Factions
item.description: Unlike other games of the style Factions are one of Final Revelations key systems. They allow for players to progress and earn skills and bonuses through activity.

item.title: Races
item.description: Human Human ×BP ×Anger BPANGENGSTRFRCDURRESSPDOFFDEFRGNRCV1.71.32.31.51.51.41.752.432.551.91.7 Passive: Third Eye Transformations: Zenith Prime Saiyan Saiyan ×BP ×Anger ...

item.title: Skills
item.description: Skills are active abilities that do not adjust stat mods. Skills are often used in combat, but there are a number of utility skills that have different situational uses.

item.title: Transformations
item.description: A Transformation is a special type of Buff that is almost always unique to a race. Transformations typically have modifiers and abilities that are far beyond even Unique buffs.

item.title: Stats
item.description: Stats represent the basic fighting abilities of a character. Each stat has a Stat Modifier, or Stat Mod associated with it, which multiplies the stat’s effectiveness.
